content: The explorer’s greatest care, however, while camping out in the forest at night—his fires, his watchmen, and his watch-dogs—will not invariably secure him from danger, if there happen to be wild animals in the neighbourhood; leopards especially, insignificant in size as compared with the lion and the tiger,—there are few things so daring that a hungry leopard will not attempt them.
translations: ita:Tuttavia, la massima attenzione dell'esploratore mentre si accampa nella foresta di notte - i suoi fuochi, le sue guardi
